```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("ggplot2")
install.packages("RColorBrewer")
install.packages("plotly")
install.packages("DT")
install.packages("dplyr")
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(plotly)
library(DT)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
  if (!requireNamespace('BiocManager', quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages('BiocManager')

  BiocManager::install('EnhancedVolcano')
```


```{r}
  library(EnhancedVolcano)
```

```{r}
CASK <- read.table("CASK_WT1-KO1_alldetected.txt", sep = "\t", header = T)
```

```{r}
Pvalue <- CASK$pvalue
hist(Pvalue,
    main = "P Values Across Transcriptome Under CASK Gene Knockout Conditions",
    col="navy",
    border="white"
    )
```

```{r}
ppi <- 400
png("Pvalue.png", width=13*ppi, height=8*ppi, res=ppi)

Pvalue <- CASK$pvalue
hist(Pvalue,
    main = "P Values Across Transcriptome Under CASK Gene Knockout Conditions",
    col="navy",
    border="white"
    )
```

```{r}
Pvalue <- CASK$pvalue
hist(Pvalue,
  main="P Values of Signficant Differential Gene Expression",
  xlim=c(0, 0.2),
  col="navy",
  border="White"
  )    
```


```{r}
Pvalue <- CASK$pvalue
hist(Pvalue,
  main="P Values of Signficant Differential Gene Expression",
  xlim=c(0, 0.05),
  col="navy",
  border="white",
  breaks=150,
  labels = TRUE
  )    
```

```{r}
ppi <- 400
png("Pvalue_selected.png", width=13*ppi, height=8*ppi, res=ppi)

Pvalue <- CASK$pvalue
hist(Pvalue,
  main="P Values of Significant Differential Gene Expression",
  xlim=c(0, 0.05),
  col="navy",
  border="white",
  breaks=150,
  labels = TRUE
  )    
```

```{r}
CASKfc <- read.table("CASKfc.txt", sep = "\t", header = T)
```


```{r}
FC <- CASKfc$log2FoldChange
hist(FC,
  main="Fold Changes of All Differentially Expressed Genes",
  xlim=c(-11, 11),
  col="#b34a00",
  border="black"
  )    
```
